channel.title: Preview on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Preview on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the second release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.26! This version fixes a few issues in the major upgrade process as well as in the integration of volume snapshot recovery with WALs via plugin. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.26! This preview introduces features like declarative offline in-place major upgrades of PostgreSQL, startup and readiness probes for replicas, declarative management of extensions and schemas, and more. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.25.0 and 1.24.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is thrilled to unveil the release of version 1.25.0, packed with exciting new features, along with the maintenance update 1.24.2 for the 1.24.x series.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.25.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.25! This preview introduces features like declarative databases, logical replication publications and subscriptions, enhanced control over data durability in synchronous replication, and more. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.
